metadata.description: Airnub builds governed, enterprise-ready developer platforms that connect compliance, delivery, and trust.

footer.description: Governing the developer platform lifecycle with trust, automation, and continuous evidence.

metadata.title: Airnub builds governed, enterprise-ready developer platforms
metadata.description: Operationalize trust across every release pipeline with Airnub's platform engineering, compliance, and automation expertise.

hero.title: Govern supervised AI delivery with confidence
hero.description: Airnub combines the Agentic Delivery Framework, Speckit, and compliance engineers so platform teams can launch governed AI services with evidence from day zero.

projects.title: Explore our platform accelerators
projects.description: Dedicated microsites show how the Agentic Delivery Framework and Speckit bring trust-first automation to platform teams.

adf.title: Agentic Delivery Framework
adf.description: Blueprint the Agentic Delivery Framework with patterns, playbooks, and control automation.

speckit.title: Speckit
speckit.description: See how Speckit governs specs, controls, and evidence with programmable workflows.

unifiedGovernance.title: Unified governance
unifiedGovernance.description: Automate policy checks across SDLC gates with contextual guardrails for every team.

evidenceOnDemand.title: Evidence on demand
evidenceOnDemand.description: Capture SBOMs, attestations, and traceability artifacts as part of your delivery workflow.

platformAccelerators.title: Platform accelerators
platformAccelerators.description: Blueprints for platform teams to onboard products faster without sacrificing trust or velocity.

speckit.title: Secure the spec loop with Speckit
speckit.description: Speckit brings change management, supply-chain controls, and runtime attestations together. Govern policy gates with programmable workflows and surface the right signals to auditors and stakeholders instantly.

items.governedSpecLoop: Governed spec loop keeps architecture, security, and compliance in sync.
items.policyGates: Policy gates codify approvals across CI/CD, cloud, and service catalogs.
items.automatedEvidence: Evidence captured automatically: SBOMs, attestations, and traceability.

services.title: Services aligned to your platform journey
services.description: From first landing zones to regulated scale, our services team embeds with platform, security, and compliance leaders to deliver quick wins and long-term maturity.

assessment.label: Assessment:
assessment.description: map current controls to regulatory expectations.

blueprint.label: Blueprint:
blueprint.description: reference architectures with guardrails for teams and services.

adoption.label: Adoption:
adoption.description: playbooks to scale platform operations with confidence.

operatingModel.title: Platform operating model
operatingModel.description: Team structures, KPIs, and governance rituals to align craft and compliance.

regulatedCloud.title: Regulated cloud acceleration
regulatedCloud.description: Deploy secure baselines for FedRAMP, SOC 2, and ISO 27001 without slowing delivery.

innerSource.title: InnerSource enablement
innerSource.description: Empower product teams with paved roads, golden paths, and clear guardrails.

trustReadiness.title: Trust & assurance readiness
trustReadiness.description: Prepare evidence for auditors, partners, and leadership with zero scramble.

metadata.description: Get in touch with Airnub for product demos, partnerships, or media inquiries.

hero.title: Let’s build your trust-forward platform
hero.description: Tell us about your goals and we will connect you with the right Airnub experts.

form.description: We typically reply within one business day.

success.title: Message sent

validation.email: Please enter a valid work email.

officeHours.title: Office hours
officeHours.description: Join a weekly live session to see how Airnub and Speckit can accelerate your platform roadmap.

metadata.title: Company
metadata.description: Meet the Airnub team advancing governed developer platforms and trust-first delivery.

hero.title: We help platform leaders turn trust into a competitive advantage
hero.description: Airnub unites platform engineering, security, and compliance to deliver governed developer experiences.

values.name: Trust by design
values.description: Every workflow we create protects end users, developers, and auditors alike.

values.name: Craft with empathy
values.description: We build for platform teams because we are platform teams—practitioners first, vendors second.

values.name: Evidence over opinion
values.description: Decisions are grounded in measurable outcomes, transparent data, and shared accountability.

careers.title: Careers
careers.description: We are a remote-first team across North America and Europe. If you’re passionate about developer platforms, compliance automation, and building delightful experiences, we’d love to chat.

cards.title: Press kit
cards.description: Logos, product screenshots, and leadership bios ready for publication.

cards.title: Media inquiries
cards.description: Request commentary on platform governance, DevSecOps, and compliance automation trends.

items.title: Privacy Notice
items.description: We collect only the information needed to respond to inquiries and improve our services.

items.title: Terms of Service
items.description: Our terms set expectations for customers, partners, and community contributors.

metadata.title: Products
metadata.description: Discover Airnub offerings including Speckit, reference architectures, and trust accelerators.

hero.title: Everything you need to govern modern software delivery
hero.description: Airnub packages products, playbooks, and trusted services to help platform teams scale without slowing developers.

offerings.name: Speckit
offerings.description: Policy-driven delivery controls, SBOM management, and evidence automation for platform teams.

offerings.name: Platform blueprints
offerings.description: Cloud landing zones, golden paths, and service catalogs aligned to regulated industries.

offerings.name: Trust accelerators
offerings.description: SOC 2, ISO 27001, and FedRAMP readiness kits bundled with evidence automations.

insights.title: Built with trust as a feature
insights.description: Every product ships with compliance guardrails, audit-ready evidence, and API-first integrations that fit your delivery stack.
bullets: Role-aware workflows for platform, security, and compliance leads
Open APIs and adapters for the tools you already use

insights.title: Shared Supabase foundations
paragraphs: Both the Airnub corporate site and Speckit microsite capture leads into the same Supabase project, keeping GTM signals aligned and secure.
Row-level security ensures visitor submissions stay private while platform teams analyze performance via service-role access.

metadata.title: Services
metadata.description: Advisory and enablement services that align platform strategy, delivery, and compliance outcomes.

hero.title: Embedded experts for every stage of your platform journey
hero.description: We combine product thinking with compliance and platform engineering so you can unlock reliable, trusted delivery.

engagements.title: Platform operating model
engagements.description: Align platform, security, and compliance teams with clear swimlanes, OKRs, and governance rituals.

engagements.title: Landing zone & golden path design
engagements.description: Reference architectures, IaC, and policies that bootstrap developer experience with guardrails.

engagements.title: Trust & assurance readiness
engagements.description: Automate evidence capture and streamline audits with Speckit-powered workflows.

outcomes.title: Outcomes-first engagements
outcomes.description: We align each engagement to measurable KPIs—deployment frequency, change failure rate, audit readiness time, and customer trust metrics.
outcomes.note: We embed alongside your teams for 6–12 weeks, transfer knowledge continuously, and operationalize Speckit for long-term success.

metadata.title: Solutions
metadata.description: Industry-specific pathways to govern developer platforms for financial services, public sector, and SaaS.

hero.title: Governance blueprints tailored to your sector
hero.description: Airnub pairs platform expertise with regulatory insight so you can design, operate, and scale with clarity.

sectors.name: Financial services
sectors.summary: Balance product speed with FFIEC, PCI DSS, and SOX mandates.
bullets: Evidence automation for auditors and regulators
Change control aligned to core banking systems

sectors.name: Public sector
sectors.summary: Accelerate FedRAMP and StateRAMP initiatives with repeatable guardrails.

sectors.name: Enterprise SaaS
sectors.summary: Ship confidently across regions while meeting SOC 2, ISO 27001, and HIPAA expectations.
bullets: Runtime policy enforcement across CI/CD and runtime

partner.title: Partner with platform strategists and compliance engineers
partner.description: Our cross-functional pods pair product, platform, and trust roles to deliver value from the first sprint. We co-design operating models, deliver automation, and upskill your teams.
expectations: Capability assessments mapped to maturity curves
Evidence-as-code automations using Supabase and open standards
Embedded enablement that leaves your teams empowered

metadata.title: Trust
metadata.description: Explore Airnub's approach to security, privacy, and responsible disclosure.

hero.title: Transparency and assurance for every release
hero.description: Our security, privacy, and reliability posture is documented in a single destination so your teams can evaluate Airnub quickly.

highlights.title: Trust Center
highlights.description: Review certifications, policies, and live status updates for Airnub and Speckit services.

highlights.title: Vulnerability Disclosure
highlights.description: Coordinated security response with a 24-hour acknowledgement commitment and PGP details.

highlights.title: security.txt
highlights.description: Find our canonical security contact, encryption keys, and preferred disclosure channels.

request.title: Need something specific?
request.description: Our team can provide tailored security questionnaires, architecture diagrams, and penetration testing summaries under NDA.

metadata.description: Guides, changelog, and enablement materials that help platform teams operationalize trust.

hero.title: Enablement, updates, and research for platform and security teams
hero.description: Stay current on Airnub platform accelerators, Speckit releases, and operating guidance for high-trust software teams.

guides.title: Platform governance playbook
guides.description: A practical guide to designing guardrails without slowing product teams.

guides.title: SLSA-aligned delivery checklist
guides.description: Steps to implement supply chain security from source to runtime.

guides.description: Codify audit artifacts with Supabase, GitHub Actions, and Speckit.
